title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 2302.14 - Dissemination-advisory council evaluation:
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 2302.14 - Dissemination-advisory council evaluation: State Regulations

Procedures for Dissemination

Calendar
1. The annual report of the advisory council will be
submitted to the Commissioner of Education and will contain the evaluation
findings of the council. Jan. 1, 1979
2. The evaluation findings will be reported to and
discussed with title IV program officers before the advisory council meetings
during fiscal year 1978. Sept. 1977 Dec. 1977 Feb. 1978 April 1978
3. The entire report of the findings will be compiled
and disseminated to Education Department staff having responsibility for the
title IV program. Jan. 1979
4. A summary of the evaluation report will be
disseminated to school districts and title IV special interest groups. Jan. 1979

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
2302.14

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
